data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Sulawesi Tenggara, Indonesia.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sulawesi Tenggara, Indonesia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the state of Sulawesi Tenggara be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 31 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Sulawesi Tenggara, Indonesia to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 1,981,010, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Wakatobi, Kaledupa people might believe through him.
Father, give the disciples of the the state of Sulawesi Tenggara an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Sulawesi Tenggara, Indonesia know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.section_summary:
the state of Sulawesi Tenggara, Indonesia has a population of 2,232,600.

We estimate Sulawesi Tenggara has 71,631 people who might know Jesus, 179,959 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,981,010 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 31 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, help the 71,631 believers in Sulawesi Tenggara to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

location.name: Sulawesi Tenggara
location.people_groups_list: Taloki, Wotu, Wakatobi, Wolio, Tolaki, Laiwui
